General_Description: '''Charged Vengeance''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "The blood of [[Sparta|our]] men is flowing in the streets. Crush the [[Athens|enemy]] with heavy blows to make them pay."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew a number of Athenian [[soldier]]s with [[sword]]s and [[spear]]s and mighty blows, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
